page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: There is quite a variety of housing in Knighton.We have the housing estates on the outskirts of the town and the older houses and other buildings in the town itself.The council estates to the north of the town are{Radnor Drive}and{Laurel's {Meadow,}to the south{Fronhir and {Pontfaen}and to the west {Ffrydd {Terrace. } The private estate to the north of the town is {Millfield Close }and the private estates to the west are { {Underffrydd Wood,Underhill Crescent, {The Dingle}and{Rocke's Meadow. { }A complex of{flatlets }have been built near {St.Edward's Church }for the older residents of the town.These flatlets have a warden service day and night. { }
